attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the increase in gambling centres is killing the seaside and we already have 250.000/275.000 problem gamblers in this country alone and more than enough oppotunities to gamble in the form of betting shops racetracks etc. The baize tables are dangerously addictive and if we bring in more casinos we will have more 

>addicts and suicides

>domestic violence & child abuse

>more loan sharks & prostitution

>more rape and other assaults

>more broken homes as the little details
of life called responsibilities such as rent , tax , food for the children's mouths are left to slide (go unmet)

it is also a temptation for sensible gamblers to go chasing losses & as regards the vulnerable it's swapping one risk for another & dragging down the quality of life for everyone else as wages for gambling parlour staff come from the black hole of debt & unmet needs

we do not need to become america's 51st state

if you want this country to be suitable for children to grow up in

cut the number of gambling arcades

increase the number of videogame arcades

& if you really want to regenerate the north economy dont start building monstrous mega casinos just stop shutting the factories
